creator: MERGE
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a MERGE Cube and a smartphone or a tablet to experience. Find out how to get a MERGE Cube to learn more at: https://www.MergeCube.com.

Engage your students in active, hands-on learning with a MERGE Cube and the MERGE Explorer app!

With interactive experiences for elementary through middle school, MERGE Explorer lets students investigate a smoking volcano, examine a great white shark, and hold the earth in the palm of their hands. They can even dissect a frog (humanely)!

Using innovative virtual and augmented reality (VR/AR) technology, and aligned with Next Generation Science Standards (NGSS), students will learn about topics such as earth science, life cycles and traits, ocean animals, space systems, structure and properties of matter, energy, waves, light, sound and more.

Early studies have shown that using AR/VR with your students will improve academic achievement, academic growth and digital literacy, and will prepare them for jobs of the future. MERGE Cube and the Explorer app is changing the way students learn and teachers teach. Explore AR/VR with your classes today with MERGE Explorer!

More Details:
This is the “early release” version of MERGE Explorer
Content will be added regularly in all STEAM categories (science, technology, engineering, art, and math).
Currently aligned to New Generation Science Standards (NGSS) with other state standards to be added in the future.
Activity plans are currently being written by educators that you can use in your classroom.
Teacher controls and dashboard coming soon.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

We offer two auto-renewing subscription options:
MERGE Explorer annual subscription: $99.99 (only $8.25/month!)
MERGE Explorer monthly subscription: $19.99

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. Your MERGE Explorer subscription will automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the current period at the price of the chosen subscription and your credit card will be charged through your Google Play account. Refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term. You can cancel your subscription (i.e. turn off automatic renewal) in the Google Play Account Settings after you have made the purchase.


If you have any questions or suggestions, we want to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@MergeVR.com.

ABOUT MERGE
We're virtual and augmented reality specialists that push the boundaries of imagination, merging the physical and digital worlds to build educational experiences that prepare every student to be future scientists, doctors, engineers, artists and creators. Learn more at www.MergeVR.com/about

Privacy Policy:
https://MergeVR.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use:
https://MergeVR.com/terms-of-use
descriptionShort: Inspire your students to engage and learn with augmented and virtual reality!

appDetails.developerAddress: 454 Soledad St, Ste# R-100. San Antonio, TX 78205
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re excited to announce multiple updates to Merge Explorer:

New Human Anatomy topic card - in this topic card, you’ll interact with a human model to learn about different body systems and isolate organs in each, and place a life-sized AR human model in your physical space and watch it grow from kid to adult!
Quizzes - most topic cards now include quizzes for multiple grade levels!
New Languages - Now you can teach and learn with Merge Explorer in Chinese, Dutch and Portuguese!

title: MERGE Explorer

container.value: 454 Soledad St, Ste# R-100. San Antonio, TX 78205

creator: MERGE
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a Merge Cube and a smartphone or a tablet to experience. Find out how to get a Merge Cube and learn more at: https://www.MergeCube.com.

Students can learn science effectively with over 100 science simulations they can touch, hold and interact with! Merge Explorer (along with a Merge Cube) allows students to investigate a smoking volcano in the palm of their hand, examine a great white shark up close, hold and explore the solar system, dissect a frog (humanely!), and so much more. With easy-to-follow activities and built-in quizzes, students gain key knowledge while immersed in learning, both in the classroom or while remote learning at home.

Merge Explorer includes NGSS-aligned topics for K-8th grade, like Physical Science, Life Science, and Earth & Space Science.

If you have any questions or suggestions, we want to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@mergeedu.com.
descriptionShort: Learn science with hands-on, interactive simulations!

appDetails.developerAddress: 454 Soledad St, Ste# R-100. San Antonio, TX 78205
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This version of Merge Explorer will officially kick off our introductory support for Chromebooks! Merge EDU Chromebook support is an ongoing project where we aim to support as many Chromebooks as possible. Later releases will improve the overall experience, but this release has the essential UI setup and support for select 2019 or newer models. This is an active area of R&D for Merge, so we would love user feedback to help us improve! Contact us at support@mergeedu.com if you can help.

appDetails.developerAddress: 454 Soledad St, Ste# R-100. San Antonio, TX 78205
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re excited to announce that “3D Mode” and “World Mode” are now available in Merge Explorer!

“3D Mode” offers a cubeless experience for students and teachers, enabling a wider range of devices to access the science simulations, and giving you an all-new way to interact with the 3D content!

“World Mode” allows you to place all science simulations in the real world, to interact with them in your environment.

appDetails.developerAddress: 22211 IH 10 W Ste. 1206, San Antonio, TX 78257
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update brings back stamping, so you can use your Merge Cube to place simulations into your room! You can also resize and manipulate simulations that have been “placed” or “stamped”.

Other updates include:
Autofocus fix
Improved Chromebooks usability
Tracking and UI improvements
Localization fixes
Initial download size decrease to allow activities to be downloaded and cached
Other fixes and improvements

appDetails.developerAddress: 22211 IH 10 W Ste. 1206, San Antonio, TX 78257
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The “stamp” and “place in world” features were misbehaving in some of the science simulations, so we’ve fixed them! There were also a few UI issues, so we fixed those, too.

Since this is a maintenance release, and we don’t have any exciting new features or announcements to share, we’ll leave you with a science joke:

What did one tectonic plate say when it bumped into another tectonic plate?
Sorry! My Fault.

appDetails.developerAddress: 22211 IH 10 W Ste. 1206, San Antonio, TX 78257
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update, we’ve combined all Merge EDU apps under one subscription! Instead of purchasing multiple subscriptions (one for each app), you can now purchase one subscription that will unlock all the Merge EDU apps.

As part of this update, there’s a new sign in feature to ensure every user has access to their content, and additional resources like activity plans, STEM projects, and uploaded 3D objects on the Merge Dashboard.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update brings Merge EDU apps up to date with our new universal UI design, allowing customers to have a better experience on more devices! iPad users will especially benefit from this change, as it improves the layout for both landscape and portrait orientations. The new universal UI is a core part of our upcoming Headset Mode release (coming soon), which will allow anyone to experience amazing passthrough XR with the Merge Goggles.

With easy-to-follow activities and built-in quizzes, students gain key knowledge while immersed in learning, both in the classroom or while remote learning at home.

Merge Explorer includes NGSS-aligned topics for K-8th grade, like Physical Science, Life Science, and Earth & Space Science.

If you have any questions or suggestions, we want to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@mergeedu.com.
descriptionShort: Learn science with hands-on, interactive simulations!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re excited to announce the all-new Headset mode for Merge Explorer! Now you can interact with digital teaching aids and 3D models in mixed reality using the Merge Headset!!
